title: 180: Nick Viall is THE G.O.A.T. (with Game of Roses Podcast)
itunes:title: 180: Nick Viall is THE G.O.A.T. (with Game of Roses Podcast)
description:
The Broads are joined by the heroes of Bachelor Nation Analysis, Bachelor Clues and Pace Case from “Game of Roses” podcast, to dive into Nick Viall’s Bachelor season! They briefly discuss the GOAT episode but mostly take a journey through a comprehensive analysis of Nick’s entire season overall. Bachelor Clues and Pase Case do what they do best and continue to blow The Broad’s minds. Enjoy! 




GAME OF ROSES PODCAST:


Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/game-of-roses/id1469113217


Follow “Game of Roses” on Insta: https://www.instagram.com/gameofrosespod/


Bachelor Clues:https://www.instagram.com/bachelorclues/


Pase Case: https://www.instagram.com/Pacecase/






PS. Check out Nick’s most recent Patreon episodes with Vanessa, Raven, and Rachel here: https://www.patreon.com/nickviall





THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS: 


Jenni Kayne- JenniKayne.com code: CHATTY


Stamps- Stamps.com code: CHATTY


Molekule- Molekule.com code: CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
